alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 13 at 1:36AM CDT until April 13 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 119 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 18 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI COPIAH HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS MADISON RANKIN SIMPSON YAZOO IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI WASHINGTON IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANGUILLA, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DURANT, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, ISOLA, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, LEXINGTON, MADISON, MAGEE, MAYERSVILLE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, PEARL, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, ROXIE, ST. JOSEPH, TCHULA, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, AND YAZOO CITY.
